titleStmt.title: An ode to the king on his return from New-Market / set by Mr. Baptist, master of the Queen's Musick.
titleStmt.author: Draghi, Giovanni Battista, ca. 1640-1708.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Bentley, in Russel-street in Covent-Garden, with the authors consent,
